title: What do I do after eleven when I chose science and my maths is good? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have chosen Science and Mathematics as your core subjects, then you will get an ample amount of opportunities, like, you can take exam of the so-called prestigious colleges of India, namely IIT JEE, or you can go with other good colleges like IISER, IIST, and many others, otherwise, there are many private colleges waiting to take your admission. Else, if you are a very bright student, then you can pursue engineering in foreign colleges like MIT or Havard. After this, you’ll get a degree, and a good job, and you’ll lead a good life. Hope it helps.

You have many options You can do BSc in maths and statistics , afterward can do BEd to be teacher or can do MSc in statistics or in data science/data analytics to be data science expert.You can also do EngineeringCan go for BHMCTCan also think to do BSc in maths then MSc & PhD in Same to be professor or junior scientist.Can also prepare for NDA exams to go in defense
